T02D1402:78b-1: laksha aa bhi dha n'a ta auddhri to la ghu tantra pinda aartha bi wa ra nam n'a ma /
T02D1402:78b-3: mngon par brjod pa 'bum pa las phyung ba nyung
T02D1402:78b-4: du'i rgyud kyi bsdus pa'i don rnam par bshad pa
T02D1402:78b-5: zhes bya ba / dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1402:78b-6: gang gi g-yon dang g-yas pa'i zhabs kyis gzhu 'dzin dang ni gangs ri'i bu mo nyi mar brdzis //
T02D1402:78b-7: khro bo'i gzigs pas lha dang 'byung po lha min dbang po gza' yi tshogs bcas skrag mdzad cing //
T02D1402:78b-8: phyag rgya glang po stag lpags brang 'gro dge byed mi yi thod pa mgo bo'i phreng bas brgyan //
T02D1402:78b-9: de la btud nas de yi rgyud dang 'grel bshad
T02D1402:78b-10: gsal ba rdo rje'i tshig rnams 'byed pa 'di bri
T02D1402:78b-11: bya // dpa' bo'i dbang pos bskul ba 'di //
T02D1402:78b-12: dpal phyag rdo rje bdag gis ni //
T02D1402:78b-13: rnal 'byor pa yi dge spel zhing //
T02D1402:78b-14: phyag rgya che 'bras thob bya'i phyir //
T02D1402:78b-15: de nas mngon brjod 'bum pa yi //
T02D1402:78b-16: rgyud las snying po phyung ba ni //
T02D1402:78b-17: dpal he ru ka rnal 'byor che //
T02D1402:78b-18: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom //
T02D1402:78b-19: snyigs ma lnga yi dus 'dir ni //
T02D1402:78b-20: bsod nams ye shes 'bras thob phyir //
T02D1402:78b-21: phag mos gsol btab rdo rje can //
T02D1402:78b-22: nyung du'i rgyud ni rab gsal mdzad //
T02D1402:78b-23: tshe thung brtson 'grus chung ba yi //
T02D1402:78b-24: sgrub po rnams la phan phyir te //
T02D1402:78b-25: 'dod chags zhe sdang sogs ldan la //
T02D1402:78b-26: de nyid kyi ni thabs kyis kyang //
T02D1402:78b-27: gsang chen mkha' 'gro ma gsang ba //
T02D1402:78b-28: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //
T02D1402:78b-29: sems dpa' pho nya kun rang bzhin //
T02D1402:78b-30: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che //
T02D1402:78b-32: 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa //
T02D1402:78b-33: sgra yi tshul las rnam par 'das //
T02D1402:78b-34: dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul te //
T02D1402:78b-35: thog ma dbus mthar yang dag gnas //
T02D1402:78b-36: 'jig rten gsum du rnyed par dka' //
T02D1402:78b-37: thabs dang shes rab las byung ba //
T02D1402:78b-38: sngags dang rnal 'byor cho ga'i rim //
T02D1402:78b-39: brjod byar bshad pa de nyid ni //
T02D1402:78b-40: rjod par byed par gsungs pa ste //
T02D1402:78b-41: lhan cig skyes dga' he ru ka / dbu ma mchog gis dbugs 'byung ba //
T02D1402:78b-42: bshad gci zla ba nyi ma yi //
T02D1402:78b-43: rtsa ni bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1402:78b-44: phyag rgya chen po rten med pa //
T02D1402:78b-45: rdo rje phag mo rigs ldan ma //
T02D1402:79a-2: rnal 'byor pa des de mchod bya //
T02D1402:79a-3: zhes pa ae wam dbang bskur don //
T02D1402:79a-4: nyung du'i rgyud las gsal min gang //
T02D1402:79a-5: mdor bsdus tsam zhig rab gsungs te //
T02D1402:79a-6: 'grel pas rnam par rgyas par bya //
T02D1402:79a-7: 'dir dang por re zhig brjod par bya ba dang
T02D1402:79a-8: rjod par byed pa dang 'brel pa dang dgos pa
T02D1402:79a-9: dang dgos pa'i dgos pa rnams mngon par gzigs nas
T02D1402:79a-10: / gdul bya'i skye bo nges pa dang bral ba
T02D1402:79a-11: rnams kyis rang gi sems kyis bsam pas skye ba
T02D1402:79a-12: 'dir sangs rgyas nyid ster bar byed pa /
T02D1402:79a-13: gsang chen mchog la bzhugs pa /
T02D1402:79a-14: dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba /
T02D1402:79a-15: rdo rje phag mos gsol ba btab pa /
T02D1402:79a-16: bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru kas /
T02D1402:79a-17: rtsa ba'i rgyud mngon par brjod pa 'bum pa las
T02D1402:79a-18: snying po las snying po mchog gi rgyud gzhung gi
T02D1402:79a-19: tshad stong bdun brgya pa yang dag par bstan to
T02D1402:79a-20: zhes pa'o // 'dir shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag
T02D1402:79a-21: nyid can bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka ni
T02D1402:79a-23: 'dir rtogs par byed pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po ni rjod par byed pa'o //
T02D1402:79a-24: rjod par byed pa dang brjod par bya ba de
T02D1402:79a-25: dag gis phan tshun brjod bya rjod byed kyi mtshan
T02D1402:79a-27: dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la sogs pa sems can
T02D1402:79a-28: gyi don byed pa dang 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub
T02D1402:79a-30: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyis phyag rgya
T02D1402:79a-31: chen po'i dngos grub bsgrub pa dang sangs rgyas nyid
T02D1402:79a-34: gdul bya'i skye bo nges pa dang bral ba rnams
T02D1402:79a-35: kyis zhes pa nges pa ni nyan thos kyi sdom
T02D1402:79a-36: pa ste / de dang bral ba ni nges pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D1402:79a-37: de rnams kyi rang gi sems kyi bsam pa ni
T02D1402:79a-38: 'dod chags dang zhes dang la sogs pa'i bdag nyid
T02D1402:79a-39: can te / rang gi sems kyi bsam pa des kyang /
T02D1402:79a-40: skye ba 'dir sangs rgyas nyid ster bar byed pa
T02D1402:79a-41: ni snyigs ma lnga'i dus na tshe thung zhing brtson
T02D1402:79a-42: 'grus chung ba'i sgrub pa po rnams kyang skye ba
T02D1402:79a-43: 'dir sangs rgyas nyid ster bar byed pa ni bsgom
T02D1402:79a-44: pa'i thabs de nyid kyis so //
T02D1402:79b-0: gsang chen mchog la bzhugs pa zhes ba chos 'byung @79b nam mkha'i khams ni gsang chen te /
T02D1402:79b-1: de la bzhugs pa ni gsang chen mchog la bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1402:79b-2: dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma rnams kyis
T02D1402:79b-3: yongs su bskor ba zhes pa dpa' bo ni thod
T02D1402:79b-4: pa'i dum bu la sogs pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi
T02D1402:79b-5: ste / zla ba'i rkang pa rnams so //
T02D1402:79b-6: dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma ni mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa ste /
T02D1402:79b-7: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rang bzhin rnams so //
T02D1402:79b-8: de rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba ni dpa' bo
T02D1402:79b-9: dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma rnams kyis yongs su
T02D1402:79b-10: bskor ba'o // rdo rje phag mos gsol ba btab pa /
T02D1402:79b-11: bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka zhes pa /
T02D1402:79b-12: shr'i yig gnyis med ye shes te //
T02D1402:79b-13: he yig rgyu dang bral ba'o //
T02D1402:79b-14: ru yig gzugs las nges par grol //
T02D1402:79b-15: ka yig byed pa spangs pa'o //
T02D1402:79b-17: dbang phyug la sogs yon tan ldan //
T02D1402:79b-18: bha ga yang ni bdud bcom phyir //
T02D1402:79b-19: gang la de mnga'i phyir na ni //
T02D1402:79b-20: bcom ldan khams gsum dbang phyug gsungs //
T02D1402:79b-22: bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka des rtsa ba'i
T02D1402:79b-23: rgyud mngon par brjod pa 'bum ba las snying po
T02D1402:79b-24: las snying po mchog gi rgyud gzhung gi tshad stong
T02D1402:79b-25: bdun brgya pa yang dag par bstan to //
T02D1402:79b-26: bcom ldan 'das de yang rgyud 'di'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa ste /
T02D1402:79b-27: dang po bzhugs pa'i gnas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1402:79b-28: de nas dam tshig gi spyod pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sa gnas pa dang /
T02D1402:79b-29: de nas gsol ba 'debs pa po dang /
T02D1402:79b-30: ston pa po'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1402:79b-31: rigs ldan mchod pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1402:79b-32: de nas pho nya mo'i dngos grub dang /
T02D1402:79b-33: mchod pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1402:79b-34: 'dod pa'i dngos sgrub bsgom pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1402:79b-35: de nas byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le rnams
T02D1402:79b-36: kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs
T02D1402:79b-37: pa mchod pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang
T02D1402:79b-38: / sdig pa thams cad las nges par grol ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1402:79b-39: de nas rnal 'byor pa nyid bsgrub pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1402:79b-40: dam tshig bskyang ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1402:80a-1: ba bsrung ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1402:80a-2: bdud rtsi lnga bza' ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1402:80a-3: tshogs kyi 'khor lo la mthe bong dang ming med
T02D1402:80a-4: dag gis zhal du zla ba'i btung ba myang ba'i
T02D1402:80a-5: ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1402:80a-6: dbang po gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1402:80a-7: de nas zla ba bza' bsngags pa'i ngo bo nyid
T02D1402:80a-8: kyis gnas pa dang zhes pa lha dang mi'i bde
T02D1402:80a-9: ba cha bcu drug pa 'gyur ba med pa'i bde
T02D1402:80a-10: ba mchog mchod par bya'o zhes pa bcom ldan 'das
T02D1402:80a-11: rnam par gnas pa ste le'u dang po'i bsdus pa'i
T02D1402:80a-14: / de nas ri'i phug la sogs pa gnas nges pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1402:80a-15: dkyil 'khor la sogs pa de nyid bcu'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1402:80a-16: de nas bla ma dang dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i
T02D1402:80a-17: dbang phyug ma dang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo mchod
T02D1402:80a-18: pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang ;
T02D1402:80a-19: slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1402:80a-20: de nas dbang bskur ba sbyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1402:80a-22: mchod ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa zhes pa
T02D1402:80a-23: bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor dang dbang bskur ba'i le'u'i
T02D1402:80a-25: de nas mkha' 'gro ma'i gnas su rol pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1402:80a-26: de nas sngags btu ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1402:80a-27: de nas rig pa'i rgyal po'i las rab 'byam gyi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1402:80a-28: 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub brgyad bsgrub pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1402:80a-29: de nas brda'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1402:80a-30: las kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1402:80a-31: de nas de rnams kyis yang dag par smra ba
T02D1402:80a-32: dang 'gro ba dang 'ong bar bya ba'i ngo bo
T02D1402:80a-34: mkha' 'gro ma'i mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1402:80a-35: de nas phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan gyi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1402:80a-36: dam tshig gi ming brjod pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1402:80a-37: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dam tshig
T02D1402:80a-38: chen po brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa
T02D1402:80b-0: dang / de nas gcig tu ts'a ru'i ston mo'i @80b ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1402:80b-1: gtor ma sbyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1402:80b-2: de nas gnod mdzes rgyal po'i sngags btu ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1402:80b-3: de'i las rab 'byam bsgrub pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1402:80b-4: sngags dang gzugs brnyan dang bsam gtan gyi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1402:80b-5: de nas rnam par mi rtog pa'i de kho na
T02D1402:80b-6: nyid bsgom pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang
T02D1402:80b-7: / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin sreg gi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1402:80b-8: de nas zhal bzhi la sogs pa'i sngags kyi rkang
T02D1402:80b-9: pa dang lhan cig dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i dbang
T02D1402:80b-10: phyug ma'i ming nang du son pa mthar thug rdo
T02D1402:80b-11: rje la sogs pa'i sngags bzlas pa'i ngo bo nyid
T02D1402:80b-13: gnas la sogs pas bcu dang gnas nyi shu rtsa
T02D1402:80b-14: bzhi nges par bstan pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas
T02D1402:80b-15: pa dang / spyi bo la sogs par dgod pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1402:80b-16: byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sum cu
T02D1402:80b-17: rtsa bdun rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis
T02D1402:80b-18: gnas pa dang / de nas thod pa'i dum bu
T02D1402:80b-19: la sogs pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi khams rnam par
T02D1402:80b-20: dag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1402:80b-21: lha mo rnams sa spyod dang mkha' la spyod pa
T02D1402:80b-22: gzugs yongs su bsgyur ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas
T02D1402:80b-23: pa dang / rigs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rtsa
T02D1402:80b-24: mchod pa'i 'khor lo kun du spyod pa longs spyod
T02D1402:80b-25: pa dang thim pa dang dbang byed pa'i ngo bo
T02D1402:80b-27: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1402:80b-28: de nas sbrul pa dang longs spyod dang chos dang
T02D1402:80b-29: dag pa'i sku'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang
T02D1402:80b-30: / stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i
T02D1402:80b-31: ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa'o zhes pa de ltar
T02D1402:80b-32: bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka'i rgyud kyi ngo
T02D1402:80b-34: 'dis kyang rjod par byed pa dang brjod par bya
T02D1402:80b-35: ba'i bdag nyid rdo rje phag mo la rab tu
T02D1402:80b-37: de nas 'di la sa gsang ba bshad //
T02D1402:80b-38: mdor bsdus pa las rgyas par min //
T02D1402:80b-39: zhes pa la sogs pas so //
T02D1402:80b-40: gal te rgyud kyi rgyal po thams cad du 'di
T02D1402:80b-41: skad bdag gis thos pa zhes pa la sogs pas
T02D1402:81a-1: nges par bstan pa ma yin nam /
T02D1402:81a-2: ji ltar rgyud 'dir de nas 'di las gsang bzhes
T02D1402:81a-3: pa la sogs pas bzhugs pa'i gnas nges par bstan
T02D1402:81a-4: ba bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung bar 'gyur /
T02D1402:81a-5: 'dus pa dang kye'i rdo rje la sogs pa rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud du /
T02D1402:81a-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes pa la sogs
T02D1402:81a-7: pas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i rgyud bden par
T02D1402:81a-8: 'gyur ro // de'i phyir rgyud 'di bcom ldan 'das
T02D1402:81a-9: kyis yang dag par bstan pa ma yin no zhes
T02D1402:81a-10: pa tshig 'bru la rab tu rton pa 'ga' zhig
T02D1402:81a-13: 'dir ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byis pa'i skye bo
T02D1402:81a-14: tshig 'bru la rab tu rton pa la brten pa
T02D1402:81a-15: rnams kyis 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes pa
T02D1402:81a-16: la sogs pa dang bral ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
T02D1402:81a-17: ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ma yin no
T02D1402:81a-18: zhes gang zhig smra bar 'gyur ba de ni ma
T02D1402:81a-19: yin te / gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan du rton pa bzhis gsungs ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1402:81a-21: don la rton par bya'i tshig 'bru la rton pa ma yin pa dang /
T02D1402:81a-22: ye shes la rton par bya'i rnam par shes pa la rton pa ma yin pa dang /
T02D1402:81a-23: nges pa'i don la rton par bya'i drang ba'i don la rton pa ma yin pa dang /
T02D1402:81a-24: chos la rton par bya'i gang zag la rton pa ma yin pa'o //
T02D1402:81a-26: tshig 'bru la rab tu rton pa ni theg pa
T02D1402:81a-27: gang du yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gsungs so
T02D1402:81a-28: // dbyangs dang gsal byed tshogs ba ni ming tsam ste /
T02D1402:81a-29: ming can dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i chos rnams rtogs par byed pa'o //
T02D1402:81a-30: 'dir dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i chos gcig la yang ming du mar 'gyur ro //
T02D1402:81a-31: de rnams kyi nang nas ming gcig gtso bo'am /
T02D1402:81a-32: gtso bo ma yin par 'gyur ba med de /
T02D1402:81a-33: thams cad kyi dngos po dang dngos po med pa gcig rtogs par byed pa'i phyir /
T02D1402:81a-34: bud med dang mi mo dang na chung ma la
T02D1402:81a-35: sogs pa rnams kyis nu ma dang skrar ldan pa'i
T02D1402:81a-36: dngos po'i chos rab tu rtogs par byed pa'i phyir
T02D1402:81a-37: dang / de bzhin du nam mkha'i me tog dang
T02D1402:81b-0: nam mkha'i padma la sogs pa rnams kyis dngos @81b
T02D1402:81b-1: po med pa'i chos rab tu rtogs par byed pa'i
T02D1402:81b-2: dang / phyir ro // de ltar thams cad du
T02D1402:81b-3: ming dang ming can du 'brel pa rnal 'byor pa
T02D1402:81b-5: 'dir aa yig stong pa nyid rtogs par byed pa bdun pa'i mtha' can ae yig tu 'gyur ro //
T02D1402:81b-6: de'i phyir ae zhes pa'i ming gis rnam pa thams cad kyi gzhi nam mkha'i khams gzung bar bya'o //
T02D1402:81b-7: de bzhin du mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
T02D1402:81b-8: mkha' dbyings bems min dang ba dang //
T02D1402:81b-9: go 'byed ngab tu gsal ba dang //
T02D1402:81b-10: sna tshogs rdo rje gnas dang gzhi //
T02D1402:81b-11: kun gyi dbyings dang yid 'ong bar //
T02D1402:81b-13: gsang chen mchog tu dgyes pa dang //
T02D1402:81b-14: thams cad bdag nyid na rtag bzhugs //
T02D1402:81b-15: zhes pa'i bar gyis ming sna tshogs pa'i khyad par gyis gnas bstan par gsungs so //
T02D1402:81b-16: de bzhin du dpal 'dus pa la sogs par /
T02D1402:81b-17: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
T02D1402:81b-18: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D1402:81b-19: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rdo rje
T02D1402:81b-20: btsun mo'i bha ga rnams la bzhugs so zhes pa
T02D1402:81b-21: 'di la yang ming du ma ste /
T02D1402:81b-22: ae dang bha ga padma dang //
T02D1402:81b-23: bde ba'i gnas su bde ba can //
T02D1402:81b-24: seng ge'i khri dang dmigs pa med //
T02D1402:81b-25: de bzhin nyid dang pha rol phyin //
T02D1402:81b-27: de bzhin du brten pa ni //
T02D1402:81b-28: bam dang rdo rje smra mchog ster //
T02D1402:81b-29: lhan cig skyes dga' 'gyur ba med //
T02D1402:81b-30: bde dang zhi ba dge ba dang //
T02D1402:81b-31: dbang phyug kun du 'gro ba mchog / ces pa la sogs pa du ma'i ming rnams kyis //
T02D1402:81b-32: brten pa yongs su bsgrags pa yin //
T02D1402:81b-33: bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan yang dag par brjod par /
T02D1402:81b-34: ye shes sku ni rgyu med pa //
T02D1402:81b-36: shes rab pha rol phyin pa rten /
T02D1402:81b-37: rnam pa thams cad pa nyid brtags //
T02D1402:81b-38: dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje gang //

T02D1402:81b-41: de'i byir rgyud gzhan du gsungs pa //

T02D1402:81b-43: dbus su bam yig gis brgyan pa //
T02D1402:81b-44: bde ba thams cad kyi ni gzhi //
T02D1402:81b-45: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog / ces pa dang /
T02D1402:81b-47: thog mtha' med cing zhi ba ste //
T02D1402:82a-0: @82a * // dngos po dngos med zang pa'i gtso //
T02D1402:82a-1: stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa //
T02D1402:82a-2: byang chub sems zhes dran pa'o //
T02D1402:82a-3: zhes pa la sogs pa rgyud gzhan du mar shes
T02D1402:82a-4: rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor 'di
T02D1402:82a-6: de nas gang la 'di skad bdag gis thos pa
T02D1402:82a-7: la sogs pa yod pa de ni bcom ldan 'das
T02D1402:82a-8: kyis gsungs pa'i rgyud yin la /
T02D1402:82a-9: gang la med pa de ni ma yin no zhes
T02D1402:82a-10: sangs rgyas pa rnams kyis smra bar mi bya ste
T02D1402:82a-11: / 'dir log pa'i thos pas mngon par khengs pa
T02D1402:82a-12: dang ldan pa rnams kyi sngags kyi tshul la ma
T02D1402:82a-13: mthong ba'i chos kyi skyon bzung ba las rtsa ba'i
T02D1402:82a-15: rtsa ba'i ltung ba la sogs pas thos pa'i mngon
T02D1402:82a-16: pa'i nga rgyal dang ldan pa rnams mnar med par
T02D1402:82a-18: de'i phyir rgyud 'dir de nas 'di la gsang ba
T02D1402:82a-19: zhes pa la sogs pa'i rgyud bstan pa la 'gal
T02D1402:82a-20: ba med de / stong pa nyid dang snying rje'i
T02D1402:82a-21: bdag nyid shes rab dang thabs kyi chos rab tu
T02D1402:82a-22: rtogs par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1402:82a-23: 'dir mngon par brjod pa 'bum par gsungs pa /
T02D1402:82a-24: stong nyid snying rje gcig gyur pa //
T02D1402:82a-25: rgyud gang la ni rab bstan zhing //
T02D1402:82a-26: 'jig rten mgon po sgrub byed pa //
T02D1402:82a-27: rgyud de sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa'o //
T02D1402:82a-28: 'jig rten kun rdzob bden pa yis //
T02D1402:82a-29: 'jig rten dngos grub bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02D1402:82a-30: sngags bzlas de bzhin cho ga dang //
T02D1402:82a-31: rnam rtog sgom ba rab tu gsungs //
T02D1402:82a-32: don dam bden pas gsungs pa ni //
T02D1402:82a-33: ye shes sku ni rab bsgrub phyir //
T02D1402:82a-34: kun rtog thams cad spangs pa yi //
T02D1402:82a-35: sgom pa de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs //
T02D1402:82a-36: zhes pa rgyud so sor bzhag pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1402:82a-38: de nas 'di las gsang ba bshad //
T02D1402:82a-39: ces pa la sogs pas rgyud la gsungs pa'i drang
T02D1402:82a-40: ba'i don dang nges pa'i don gyis rnam par dbye
T02D1402:82a-41: bar bya ste / de nas 'di las zhes pa
T02D1402:82a-42: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi bar
T02D1402:82a-43: ma chad par mkha' 'gro ma'i 'khor lo bde mchog
T02D1402:82a-44: gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
T02D1402:82a-45: mngon par brjod pa 'bum pa las /
T02D1402:82a-46: bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru kas /
T02D1402:82a-47: rdo rje phag mo la bos par gyur pa /
T02D1402:82b-0: rnal 'byor @82b nyid dang cho ga yis //
T02D1402:82b-1: ye shes rgyud du bshad pa nyon //
T02D1402:82b-2: zhes pa gang zhig mngon par brjod pa 'bum par
T02D1402:82b-3: he ru kar brjod pa gsang ba de nyid ngas
T02D1402:82b-4: khyod la bshad par bya ste /
T02D1402:82b-5: mdor bsdus pa las rgyas par min //
T02D1402:82b-7: de ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das rtsa ba'i rgyud las bsdus pa'i rgyud bstan par mdzad ce na /
T02D1402:82b-9: 'dir snyigs ma lnga'i dus na 'dzam bu gling pa'i mi rnams dang /
T02D1402:82b-10: khyad par du 'phags pa'i yul du tshe thung zhing shes rab dman pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1402:82b-11: rdo rje slob dpon gang yin pa de rnams rtsa
T02D1402:82b-12: ba'i ltung ba la 'jug pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro
T02D1402:82b-13: // dge slong rnams mi dge ba bcu byed pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1402:82b-14: khyim na gnas pa rnams dkon mchog gsum gyi rdzas nye bar longs spyod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1402:82b-15: mkhas pa rnams ma thos pa'i rgyud 'chad pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1402:82b-16: mkhas pa'i mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis rgyud la dka'
T02D1402:82b-17: 'grel dang 'grel bshad byed pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro
T02D1402:82b-18: // rgyud kyi don phyin ci log tu bstan nas dmyal bar 'gro ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1402:82b-19: gang zhig sangs rgyas pa rmongs pa de rnams blun
T02D1402:82b-20: pa'i dad pa nyid kyis khyim na gnas pa'i slob
T02D1402:82b-21: dpon rnams la bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D1402:82b-22: thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa rnams la sun 'byin pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1402:82b-23: slob ma gang yin pa de rnams bla ma dam pa'i skyon tshol ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1402:82b-24: bla ma dam pa ma yin pa bza' ba dang
T02D1402:82b-25: gnyis su med pa rnams la bstod pa dang mchod
T02D1402:82b-27: bla ma mnyes par bya bar gsungs pa sangs rgyas kyi gsung bzhin mi byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D1402:82b-28: chos ston pa po rnams mi dge ba bcu la rab tu 'jug pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1402:82b-29: sgrub pa po rnams phyi rol gyi bza' ba dang
T02D1402:82b-30: btung ba la longs spyod pa la chags pa 'byung
T02D1402:82b-31: bar 'gyur ro // bud med kyi 'gro ba rnams
T02D1402:82b-32: 'dod pa la shin tu brkam pa 'byung bar 'gyur
T02D1402:82b-33: bar 'gyur ro // ro // de'i phyir bcom ldan
T02D1402:82b-34: 'das kyis rtsa ba'i rgyud thams cad las bsdus pa'i
T02D1402:82b-35: bar 'gyur ro // ro // rgyud bstan to //
T02D1402:82b-36: de yang rdo rje'i tshig mang ba nyid kyi phyir
T02D1402:83a-0: thar pa don du gnyer ba'i @83a * //
T02D1402:83a-1: mkhas pa rnams kyis bla ma dam pa nye bar bsten pa dang /
T02D1402:83a-2: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa
T02D1402:83a-3: shad dang rgyud ni rgyud gzhan du gsungs pas shes
T02D1402:83a-6: mdor bsdus pa las rgyas par min //
T02D1402:83a-7: gsang ba bdag gis bshad par bya //
T02D1402:83a-8: gsang ba zhes pa drang ba'i don gyis las kyi phyag rgya'i bha ga la brjod do //
T02D1402:83a-9: nges pa'i don gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid do //
T02D1402:83a-10: dpal he ru ka yang dag sbyor //
T02D1402:83a-11: zhes pa la shr'i zhes pas lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o //
T02D1402:83a-12: he zhes pas rgyu las kyi phyag rgya dang ye shes kyi phyag rgya spangs pa'o //
T02D1402:83a-13: ru zhes pa gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o //
T02D1402:83a-14: ka zhes pa mig la sogs pa'i byed pa spangs pa ste /
T02D1402:83a-15: dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1402:83a-16: de'i yang dag sbyor zhes pa stong pa nyid dang
T02D1402:83a-17: lhan cig gcig pa nyid de stong pa nyid dang
T02D1402:83a-18: snying rje dbyer med pa nyid ngas bshad par bya'o
T02D1402:83a-19: zhes pa'o // drang ba'i don gyis dpal he ru ka ni skyes pa'i dbang po'o //
T02D1402:83a-20: de'i yang dag sbyor ba ni bud med kyi bha ga dang lhan cig pa nyid de /
T02D1402:83a-21: byis pa'i skye bo dbang po gnyis kyi bde ba
T02D1402:83a-22: mngon par 'dod pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs
T02D1402:83a-23: kyi don dang / sems yul gzhan las yongs su
T02D1402:83a-24: dgrol ba'i don du ngas bshad par bya'o zhes pa'o
T02D1402:83a-25: kyi don dang / // 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa //
T02D1402:83a-26: zhes pa las kyi tshig dang bdag gis bshad pa
T02D1402:83a-27: byed pa po la pa ra smee'i tshig tu thams
T02D1402:83a-29: 'dir phyi rol du drang ba'i don gyis 'dod pa'i
T02D1402:83a-30: don kun ni phra ba la sogs pa'i 'jig rten
T02D1402:83a-31: pa'i yon tan brgyad kyi dbang phyug dang sngags dang
T02D1402:83a-32: las dang ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor gyis
T02D1402:83a-33: 'gyur ro // de'i sgrub byed ni sngar brjod pa'i shes rab ye shes zhes pa'o //
T02D1402:83a-34: nges pa'i don gyis 'dod pa kun gyi rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
T02D1402:83a-35: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so //
T02D1402:83a-36: de'i don ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de //
T02D1402:83a-37: stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi la sogs pa
T02D1402:83a-38: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor bar byed pa'o
T02D1402:83a-39: // de'i sgrub byed ni 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed do //
T02D1402:83b-0: stong pa nyid dang snying @83b rje dbyer med pa'i rnal 'byor bshad par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1402:83b-1: bla ma las kyang bla ma ste //

T02D1402:83b-3: 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod
T02D1402:83b-4: pa'i bde ba dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan
T02D1402:83b-5: brgyad dang yang dag par ldan pa'i dngos grub po
T02D1402:83b-6: // de las kyang bla mar gyur pa ni mchog gi bla ma ste /
T02D1402:83b-7: thams cad mkhyen pa'i bde ba dbang phyug gi yon tan thams cad dang yang dag par ldan pa /
T02D1402:83b-8: tshos thams cad kyi ston pa po rnam pa thams
T02D1402:83b-9: cad pa thams cad du son pa ni bla ma
T02D1402:83b-10: las kyang bla ma ste zhes pa'o //
T02D1402:83b-11: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom //
T02D1402:83b-12: zhes pa ni 'dir drang ba'i don gyis mkha' 'gro
T02D1402:83b-13: ma ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa

T02D1402:83b-15: ye shes dang thugs dang gsung dang sku'i 'khor lo rnams dang /
T02D1402:83b-16: khva la sogs pa sgo brgyad po rnams la gnas pa rnams so ;
T02D1402:83b-17: / de rnams kyang bdag gi gdan la sogs pa'i
T02D1402:83b-18: ming gis gsungs pa lhag ma za ba'i dur khrod
T02D1402:83b-19: kyi mthar thug pa phyi rol du ri rab kyi
T02D1402:83b-20: phyogs brgyad po rnams su 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim

T02D1402:83b-22: spyi bo la sogs pa'i nges pa bstan pa ni

T02D1402:83b-25: de'i sdom pa ni gcig nyid de /
T02D1402:83b-26: bdag gi gdan la sogs pa la he ru ka dang lhan cig 'dus pa ni //
T02D1402:83b-27: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom //
T02D1402:83b-29: he ru ka yang dpa' bo rnams dang bcas pa nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid de /

T02D1402:83b-35: can no // // 'dir he ru ka dang lhan

T02D1402:83b-41: sngags kyi sa bon gyis brjod par bya ste /

T02D1402:84a-2: dang bcas pas gtso bo ma gtogs pa su ma
T02D1402:84a-3: cu rtsa drug gi dkyil 'khor pa'i bdag nyid dang
T02D1402:84a-4: / gtso bo dang bcas pa sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bdag nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D1402:84a-5: de la re zhig ka rdo rje'i rgyud brjod par bya ste /
T02D1402:84a-6: snying por ye shes kyi 'khor lo'i ze'u 'bru la stong pa nyid lnga'i bdag nyid h'um yig dang /
T02D1402:84a-7: phyogs kyi 'dab ma la aa a'a aam aa: mtshams
T02D1402:84a-8: kyi 'dab ma la ka k'a kam ka: dur khrod

T02D1402:84a-14: dang 'phel ba'i dbye bas phyogs rnams su ke kar

T02D1402:84a-20: pa'i gsal byed 'khor lo gsum la nyi shu rtsa

T02D1402:84a-42: ha ksha: zhes pa rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud sum cu rtsa drug gi gtso mo rnams dang /
T02D1402:84a-43: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud sum cu rtsa drug gi gtso bo yang ste /
T02D1402:84a-44: sa bon gcig gis rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor par 'gyur ro //
T02D1402:84a-45: sa bon tha dad pa sum cu rtsa drug gis
T02D1402:84a-46: bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor pa tha dad pa'i rgyud kyi
T02D1402:84b-0: de rnams rigs gcig tu rtogs par bya @84b ba ni ma yin no //
T02D1402:84b-2: rigs gsum dang ni rigs lnga nyid //
T02D1402:84b-3: rang bzhin gcig dang rigs brgya'o //
T02D1402:84b-4: zhes pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs las /
T02D1402:84b-5: rigs sna tshogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi rgyud rnal 'byor
T02D1402:84b-6: bas don la rton pa la brten nas rtogs par
T02D1402:84b-7: bya'o zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o zhes

T02D1402:84b-9: rten pa'i kun rdzob tu mkha' 'gro ma'i 'khor lo
T02D1402:84b-10: sdom pa'o // nges pa'i don gyis mkha' 'gro ma'i
T02D1402:84b-11: 'khor lo sdom zhes pa mkha' 'gro ma ni byang
T02D1402:84b-12: chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa

T02D1402:84b-16: de ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku dmigs pa med

T02D1402:84b-18: pa ste gcig pa nyid do //

T02D1402:84b-21: nyi ma bcu gnyis stong pa'i bdag nyid can de
T02D1402:84b-22: dang lhan cig sdom pa ni mkha' 'gro ma'i 'khor
T02D1402:84b-24: bdag gis bshad ces bya ba'i nges pa'o //

T02D1402:84b-26: gsang chen mchog tu dgyes pa dang //
T02D1402:84b-27: thams cad bdag nyid na rtag bzhugs //
T02D1402:84b-28: sems dpa' pho nya kun rang bzhin //
T02D1402:84b-29: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog / ces pa
T02D1402:84b-30: 'dir sngar gsungs pa'i stong pa nyid kyi dbyings chos
T02D1402:84b-31: can thams cad bdag nyid na rtag tu thams cad
T02D1402:84b-32: kyi tshe 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang la
T02D1402:84b-33: ltar byung ba'i dus na bzhugs zhes pa skye ba
T02D1402:84b-34: dang 'jig pa'i chos dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1402:84b-35: sems dpa' pho nya kun rang bzhin //
T02D1402:84b-36: zhes pa pho nya mo ni mkha' 'gro ma rnams te /

T02D1402:84b-39: bklags pa las nam mkha' la rgyu ba yin gyis
T02D1402:84b-40: / gnas dang nye pa'i gnas na gnas pa grong
T02D1402:84b-41: gi lha mo sems can thams cad la gnod pa

T02D1402:88b-3: dang nang du longs spyod pa'i dus la rnal 'byor

T02D1402:88b-7: longs spyod pa'i dus la mchod par bya'o zhes pa'o

T02D1402:88b-13: phyogs nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i dbye bas rnal 'byor ma

T02D1402:88b-35: srang gi 'pho ba la byang gi zhal 'byung ba

T02D1402:89a-0: thugs dang gsung dang ye shes dang sku'i zhal gyi dbye bas @89a * //
T02D1402:89a-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis shar dang lho dang nub dang

T02D1402:89a-10: 'dir chu srin gyi 'pho ba'i nyin zhag la bskrad
T02D1402:89a-11: pa'i don du khva gdong ma dang bum pa'i phyed
T02D1402:89a-12: kyi nyin zhag la dgug pa'i don du 'ug gdong

T02D1402:89a-19: sdig pa'i phyed kyi nyin zhag la rnam par dbye

T02D1402:89a-37: dbo'i zla ba'i gnam stong la dgug pa'i don du

T02D1402:132a-41: 'gro ba'i mar me zhes pa nyi ma ltar snang ba'o //
T02D1402:132a-42: ye shes sgron zhes pa sgra gcan ltar snang ba'o //
T02D1402:132a-43: gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba //
T02D1402:132a-44: zhes pa glog ltar snang ba'o //
T02D1402:132a-45: rig pa'i rgyal mchog sngags dbang po //

T02D1402:132b-0: gi dbang po'i byed pas @132b rnal 'byor pas mthong
T02D1402:132b-1: bar 'gyur ro // de nas srog rtsol gyis bcings pa ste /
T02D1402:132b-2: byed pa 'di rnams kyis bcings pa'i sbyor bas 'dod
T02D1402:132b-3: pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i mtshan nyid brtan
T02D1402:132b-4: pa dang g-yo ba'i rang bzhin can sa gsum po

T02D1402:132b-8: ji srid rdo rje'i lus dang ldan //
T02D1402:132b-9: khams gsum rgyu bcas mi rgyu ba //
T02D1402:132b-10: ma lus lus pa med par 'grub //
T02D1402:132b-11: ces pa yan lag drug bsgoms pas so zhes pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1402:132b-12: de bzhin du dpal 'dus par bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /

T02D1402:132b-14: sgom pa bsgom pa nyid ma yin //
T02D1402:132b-15: de ltar dngos po dngos po min //
T02D1402:132b-16: sgom pa dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1402:132b-18: 'dir dngos po med pa sprin med pa'i nam mkha'
T02D1402:132b-19: la sgom pa ni so sor sdud pa ste de
T02D1402:132b-20: nyid dngos po med la sgom pa med //
T02D1402:132b-22: sgom pa bsgom pa nyid ma yin //
T02D1402:132b-23: zhes pa 'dir so sor sdud bsgom pa ni dngos po med pa sprin med pa'i nam mkha' la'o //
T02D1402:132b-24: de ni sgom pa nyid ma yin par 'gyur te
T02D1402:132b-25: rnam par rtog pa'i sgom pa dang bral ba'i phyir
T02D1402:132b-26: ro zhes pa'o // dngos po med pa la gang

T02D1402:132b-33: par rtog pa'i sgom pa dmigs par mi 'gyur ro

T02D1402:132b-37: lta ste / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po
T02D1402:132b-38: brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la

T02D1402:132b-41: tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa des

T02D1402:133a-0: tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o zhes @133a *

T02D1402:133a-3: nam mkha' la snang pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
T02D1402:133a-4: // so // de ltar so sor sdud pa dang bsam gtan gyis bsnyen pa'i yan lag brjod do //
T02D1402:133a-5: de nas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi ming can dgongs pa'i skad gzhan gyis rlung gsungs so //

T02D1402:133a-7: de bzhin du 'dus pa phyi mar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /

T02D1402:133a-9: sangs rgyas lnga yis byin brlabs pa //
T02D1402:133a-10: gong bu'i gzugs kyis phyung nas ni //
T02D1402:133a-11: sna yi rtse mor rnam bsgom bya ;

T02D1402:133a-13: ra sa n'ar dkyil 'khor lnga'i chos can sa la

T02D1402:133a-16: de bzhin du sangs rgyas lnga ni la la n'a
T02D1402:133a-17: dkyil 'khor lnga'i chos can rnam par shes pa la
T02D1402:133a-18: sogs pa'i phung po lnga po rnams so //
T02D1402:133a-19: des byin gyis brlabs pa'i dbugs ni sna bug g-yon pa la'o //
T02D1402:133a-20: gong bu'i gzugs kyis phyung nas ni //
T02D1402:133a-21: zhes pa 'ding gong bu'i g-yas pa dang cig shos
T02D1402:133a-22: kyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyi srog gi rlung dbu ma

T02D1402:133a-27: zhes pa 'dir sna'i sgras lte ba dang snying ga

T02D1402:133a-30: sna yi rtse mor rnam bsgom bya'o //

T02D1402:133b-4: pa brjod do // de nas lha'i gzugs brnyan sgrub

T02D1402:133b-6: su gtum mo 'bar ba rnal 'byor pas mthong ste

T02D1402:133b-9: po sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer gyi sprin mtha' yas
T02D1402:133b-10: pa spro bar byed pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis
T02D1402:133b-11: rnam par spras pa de ni rjes su dran pa'i
T02D1402:133b-12: yan lag sgrub par brjod do //

T02D1402:133b-15: khams dang skye mched la sogs pa rnams bsregs te
T02D1402:133b-16: / g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i rtsar son pa rnam
T02D1402:133b-17: par shes pa la sogs pa dang sa la sogs
T02D1402:133b-18: pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin rnams gcig tu 'dres
T02D1402:133b-19: par gyur nas dpral bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la

T02D1402:133b-22: zla ba zhu bar gyur pa na gang zhig byang
T02D1402:133b-23: chub kyi sems thig le'i gzugs kyis 'og tu son

T02D1402:133b-30: ba'i rang bzhin gyis zhes pa'o //

T02D1402:133b-32: son pa bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis bde ba ster ba

T02D1402:134a-1: ltar yan lag drug gi rnal 'byor bsam gtan dang
T02D1402:134a-2: sngags bzlas pa dang bde bas rnal 'byor pa rnams
T02D1402:134a-3: sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub par 'gyur te bsod nams
T02D1402:134a-4: mchog / dag byed sdig pa 'jig byed pa /
T02D1402:134a-5: skye ba 'dir zhes pa bsgrub par bya ba dang /
T02D1402:134a-6: sgrub par byed pa'i nges pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T02D1402:134a-7: da ni dam tshig ces pa la sogs pas dam tshig bskyang pa brjod par bya'o //
T02D1402:134a-8: 'dir dam tshig rnam pa gnyis te phyi rol dang nang gi bdag nyid do //
T02D1402:134a-9: dam tshig de rnams rnal 'byor pas bskyang zhing bsrung
T02D1402:134a-10: bar bya ste phyi ni phyi rol la 'jig rten
T02D1402:134a-12: nang gi bdag nyid ni nang du ye shes pa 'jug pa'i don no //
T02D1402:134a-13: 'dir phyi rol la 'jig rten pa 'jug pas rnal
T02D1402:134a-14: 'byor pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs su 'gyur
T02D1402:134a-15: te phyi rol gyi dam tshig bsrung ba las so
T02D1402:134a-16: // nang gi bdag nyid la ye shes 'jug pas
T02D1402:134a-17: ye shes kyi tshogs su 'gyur te nang gi bdag
T02D1402:134a-18: nyid kyi dam tshig bsrung ba las so //
T02D1402:134a-20: legs par mnyam gzhag sgrub pa pos //
T02D1402:134a-21: rtag tu dam tshig bskyang bar bya //
T02D1402:134a-23: 'dir phyi rol dang nang gi bdag nyid kyi dam
T02D1402:134a-24: tshig rnams rgyud dang rgyud gzhan gyis rtogs par bya
T02D1402:134a-25: ste / 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal 'dus pa'i le'u bcu bdun par gsungs pa /
T02D1402:134a-26: dang por re zhi gnang gi bdag nyid kyi dam tshig rnams la 'das pa 'di lta ste /
T02D1402:134a-27: de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1402:134a-28: thams cad kyi bdag pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
T02D1402:134a-29: sku rdo rje'i dam tshig nyid kyi sku dang gsung
T02D1402:134a-30: dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung bar gyur te
T02D1402:134a-31: / sangs rgyas ye shes rgya mtsho yis //
T02D1402:134a-32: dam tshig bzhi po bsrung bar bya //
T02D1402:134a-33: sha chen rtag tu bza' bya ste //
T02D1402:134a-34: 'di ni dam tshig mchog yin no //
T02D1402:134a-36: 'dir 'dus par gsungs pa'i cho ga 'dis 'khor lo
T02D1402:134a-37: sdom par dam tshig bskyang bar rig par bya ste
T02D1402:134a-38: / rgyud ni rgyud gzhan nas rtogs par bya'o zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1402:134a-39: 'dir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rdo rje'i dam tshig gi nges pa'i don ni /
T02D1402:134a-40: 'dir nang du byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le
T02D1402:134b-0: sku'i mtshan nyid sad pa'i gnas skabs skyed @134b par
T02D1402:134b-1: byed pa shes rab kyi chags pas zhu bar gyur
T02D1402:134b-2: pa gsang ba'i padmar son pa'o //
T02D1402:134b-3: de nyid rnam pa bzhi ste /
T02D1402:134b-4: sku'i dga' ba dang gsung gi dga' ba dang thugs
T02D1402:134b-5: kyi dga' pa dang ye shes kyi dga' ba'i dbye
T02D1402:134b-6: bas byang chub kyi sems rnam pa bzhi'i sku'i thig
T02D1402:134b-7: le'i dam tshig tu brjod do //
T02D1402:134b-9: sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes rdo rje
T02D1402:134b-10: rnams gsang bar byang chub kyi sems kyi gzugs kyis
T02D1402:134b-12: dam tshig bzhi po de nyid bsrung bar bya ste /
T02D1402:134b-14: sha chen rtag tu bza' bya ste //
T02D1402:134b-15: zhes pa sha chen po 'du byed kyi phung po'o //
T02D1402:134b-16: de nyid bza' bar bya ste sgrib pa med par bya'o zhes pa nges pa'i don no //
T02D1402:134b-18: sangs rgyas ye shes rgya mtsho yis //
T02D1402:134b-19: zhes pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis so //
T02D1402:134b-20: 'di ni dam tshig mchog yin no //

T02D1402:137b-36: de ltar skad cig snga ma 'gags pas phyi ma 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T02D1402:137b-37: ji ltar lhan cig skyes pa'i skad cig ma'i bar ni chags pa'i phyogs so //
T02D1402:137b-38: de ltar dga' ba thams cad lhan cig skyes par ro mnyam pa nyid dang rdzogs pa nyid do //
T02D1402:137b-39: de nas rdo rje nor bur byang chub kyi sems 'phos par gyur na chags bral gyi phyogs so //
T02D1402:137b-40: chags bral gyi phyogs la dang po dga' ba'i chags bral lo //
T02D1402:138a-0: dga' ba'i chags bral zad pa las mchog dga'i @138a * //
T02D1402:138a-2: mchog dga'i chags bral zad pa las dga' 'bral gyi dga' ba'i chags bral lo //
T02D1402:138a-3: dga' bral gyi dga' ba'i chags bral zad ba las
T02D1402:138a-4: lhan cig skyes ba'i dga' ba'i chags bral lo zhes
T02D1402:138a-5: pa de ltar dam tshig bzhi bcom ldan 'das kyis
T02D1402:138a-6: gsungs so // de ltar skad cig re 'gags pas
T02D1402:138a-7: skad cig gzhan 'byung bar 'gyur te ji srid lhan
T02D1402:138a-8: cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i chags bral gyi skad cig
T02D1402:138a-9: ma'i bar ni chags bral gyi phyogs so //
T02D1402:138a-10: de ltar dga' ba la sogs pa'i chags pa dang
T02D1402:138a-11: bral ba thams cad lhan cig skyes pa'i chags bral
T02D1402:138a-12: du re mnyam pa nyid dang rdzogs pa nyid do
T02D1402:138a-13: // de ltar dkar po'i phyogs ni dga' ba bzhi'i bdag nyid can no //
T02D1402:138a-14: nag po'i phyogs ni dga' ba bzhi'i chags bral gyi bdag nyid can no //
T02D1402:138a-15: de ltar chags pa dang chags bral dag las 'jig
T02D1402:138a-16: rten gsum po rnams mnyam par ma bzhag cing rnam
T02D1402:138a-18: lhan cig skyes pa'i skad cig 'pho ba med pa
T02D1402:138a-19: la rnam par gnas pa med pa nyid kyi phyir
T02D1402:138a-20: zhes pa mnyam par gzhag pa dang mnyam par ma
T02D1402:138a-21: bzhag pa'i sgrub pa po'i nges pa'o //
T02D1402:138a-22: shes rab dang 'grogs pa 'di nyid la bsnyen pa
T02D1402:138a-23: la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud gzhan rnams
T02D1402:138a-25: tsum pa 'khyud pa bsnyen pa ste //
T02D1402:138a-26: padmar rdo rje nyer sgrub pa //
T02D1402:138a-27: rdo rje bskyod pa bsgrub pa ste //
T02D1402:138a-28: de yi bde ba sgrub pa che //
T02D1402:138a-30: de ltar byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le'i dam
T02D1402:138a-31: tshig rnams sgrub pa pos legs par mnyam par gzhag
T02D1402:138a-32: pas bskyad par bya'o zhes pa bco ldan 'das kyi
T02D1402:138a-33: nges pa'o // de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyis
T02D1402:138a-34: rgyud 'di nyid du dam tshig chen po brgyad gsungs
T02D1402:138a-36: des par dngos grub rnams kyi rgyu //
T02D1402:138a-37: dam tshig rnams ni bskyang ba dang //
T02D1402:138a-38: rigs gzhan las byung pho nya mo //
T02D1402:138a-39: 'dod la chags pas bgrod mi bya //
T02D1402:138a-40: gnyis med thogs pa med pa dang //
T02D1402:138a-41: dam tshig rnams ni bskyad pa dang //
T02D1402:138a-42: mi mo'i spyod pa legs par bsrubs //
T02D1402:138a-43: tshangs par spyod pa de bzhin zhal //
T02D1402:138a-44: 'dren ba rtsa yi kun spyod do //
T02D1402:138b-0: zhes @138b pa dam tshig brgyad du dran //
T02D1402:138b-1: rnal 'byor dbang pos gad bsrung ba //
T02D1402:138b-2: myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02D1402:138b-4: 'di'i nges pa'i don brjod par bya'o //
T02D1402:138b-5: dngos grub rnams kyi zhes pa 'dir dngos grub rnams
T02D1402:138b-6: ni las kyi phyag rgya dang ye shes kyi phyag
T02D1402:138b-7: rgya dang phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ste /
T02D1402:138b-8: gsum po rnams kyi rgyu ni nges par byang chub
T02D1402:138b-9: kyi sems te 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs
T02D1402:138b-10: na spyod pa dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
T02D1402:138b-11: rgyas kyi 'bras bu thob pa'i phyir byang chub kyi
T02D1402:138b-12: sems 'pho ba med pa'o zhes pa dam tshig dang
T02D1402:138b-13: po'o // dam tshig rnams ni bskyang ba dang //
T02D1402:138b-14: zhes pa dam tshig ni byang chub kyi sems kyi
T02D1402:138b-15: thig le bzhi po rnams te de rnams sngar brjod
T02D1402:138b-16: pa'i cho gas mgrin pa dang snying ga dang lte
T02D1402:138b-17: ba dang gsang bar 'ongs pa shes rab kyi chags
T02D1402:138b-18: pas zhu bar gyur pa dga' ba bcu drug gi
T02D1402:138b-20: de rnams bskyang ba ni bsrung ba ste rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi dam tshig gnyis pa'o //
T02D1402:138b-21: rigs gzhan las byung po nya mo //
T02D1402:138b-22: 'dod la chags pas bgrod mi bya //
T02D1402:138b-23: zhes pa 'dir rigs ldan ma dor nas phyi rol
T02D1402:138b-24: du dngos grub kyi don du mkha' 'gro ma la
T02D1402:138b-25: sogs pa gzhan gyi rigs las byung ba rnams bsgom
T02D1402:138b-26: par mi bya'o zhes pa nges pa'i don te dam
T02D1402:138b-27: tshig gsum pa'o // gnyis med ces pa thig le
T02D1402:138b-28: bzhi'i dam tshig rnams nya'i mthar gnyis su med par
T02D1402:138b-29: byed pa ste dam tshig bzhi pa'o //
T02D1402:138b-30: thogs pa med pa zhes pa dang yi ge las
T02D1402:138b-31: thig le bzhi'i dam tshig rnams kyi spyod pa dga'
T02D1402:138b-32: ba bcu drug gi rang bzhin thogs pa med pa
T02D1402:138b-33: nag po'i phyogs la ma zhugs pa'o zhes pa dam
T02D1402:138b-34: tshig lnga pa'o // mi mo'i spyod pa legs par bsrubs //
T02D1402:138b-35: zhes pa mi mo ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun du bzang mo'o //
T02D1402:138b-36: de'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
T02D1402:138b-37: sems can gyi don gyi bya ba rnam pa du
T02D1402:138b-38: ma ste / legs par bsrubs pa ni bde ba'i
T02D1402:138b-39: sems kyis rtag tu spyod pa'i zhes pa dam tshig
T02D1402:138b-40: ma ste / drug pa'o // tshangs par spyod pa de bzhin zhal //
T02D1402:138b-41: zhes pa 'dir zhal ni rdo rje'i sgo ste rtag
T02D1402:138b-42: tu 'pho ba med pa'i tshul khrims zhes pa dam
T02D1402:138b-43: tshig bdun pa'o // 'dren pa rtsa yi kun spyod do //
T02D1402:139a-1: byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le rnams rtsa'i kun
T02D1402:139a-2: spyod aa wa dh'u t'i mkha' 'gro gdong mar kun
T02D1402:139a-3: du spyod par son pa rnams /
T02D1402:139a-4: rdo rje nor bu las 'dren pa ni 'gugs pa ste /
T02D1402:139a-5: gsang ba dang lte ba dang snying ga dang mgrin
T02D1402:139a-6: pa dang dpral ba dang gtsug tor du lte ba
T02D1402:139a-7: nas lte ba'i kun spyod la khu ba steng du
T02D1402:139a-8: bgrod ba'o zhes pa dam tshig brgyad pa'o //
T02D1402:139a-9: de ltar dam tshig brgyad po 'di rnams gang zhig
T02D1402:139a-10: nges par dus thams cad du spyod bar byed pa
T02D1402:139a-11: ste / myur du phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub
T02D1402:139a-12: thob par 'gyur zhes pa ste nang gi dam tshig
T02D1402:139a-13: ste / bskyang ba'o // slar yang phyi rol du ni dngos grub rnams //
T02D1402:139a-14: zhes pa phyi rol gyi dngos grub 'og min gyi gnas kyi mthar thug pa'o //
T02D1402:139a-15: rgyu ni nges par byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D1402:139a-16: sbyin pa la sogs pa bsod nams kyi tshogs te dam tshig dang po'o //
T02D1402:139a-17: dam tshig rnams ni bskyang ba dang //
T02D1402:139a-18: zhes pa dam tshig ni phyi rol du chad dang go ku la sogs pa dang /
T02D1402:139a-19: rigs dang mi ldan pa la mngon par bgrod pa dang bdud rtsi lnga bza' ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1402:139a-20: de rnams bskyang pa ni yul dang rigs kyi tha snyad kyis bsrung ba'o //
T02D1402:139a-21: gal te byed pa de'i tshe sbas te byed pa ni dam tshig gnyis pa'o //
T02D1402:139a-22: rigs gzhan las byu ba pho nya mo zhes pa la rigs gzhan zhi ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1402:139a-23: rigs der dbang bskur ba ni rigs gzhan las byung ba ste /
T02D1402:139a-24: rigs gzhan las byung ba ni sangs rgyas pa'i dam tshig sun 'byin pa'o //
T02D1402:139a-25: de bzhin du gzhan dam tshig dang mi ldan pa rnams la bgrod par mi bya'o //
T02D1402:139a-26: 'dod pa la chags pas gal te bgrod par byed
T02D1402:139a-27: pa de'i tshe dam tshig rnam par nyams pa'i phyir
T02D1402:139a-28: 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub nyams par 'gyur ro zhes
T02D1402:139a-30: gnyis med ces pa pho nya mo dang dpa' bo
T02D1402:139a-31: dag dus gcig la gnyis su med pa'i byang chub
T02D1402:139a-32: kyi sems dang bde ba myang ba'o zhes pa dam
T02D1402:139a-33: tshig bzhi pa'o // dam tshig rnams kyi spyod pa dang //
T02D1402:139a-34: zhes pa thogs pa med pa bsnyen pa dang dam tshig rnams kyi spyod pa dang /
T02D1402:139a-35: sngags kyi dngos grub la sogs pa spro ba'i lha rnams gzhom du med pa ste /
T02D1402:139b-0: bgegs rnams kyis gzhom par mi nus pa'o zhes pa dam tshig @139b lnga pa'o //
T02D1402:139b-1: mi mo'i spyod pa legs par bsrub //
T02D1402:139b-2: ces pa mi mo ni rigs thams cad las byung ba'o //
T02D1402:139b-3: de'i spyod pa ni tsum pa na dang 'khyud pa la sogs pa rnam pa mang po ste /
T02D1402:139b-4: de rnams la legs par bsrub par byed pa'o zhes pa dam tshig drug pa'o //
T02D1402:139b-5: tshangs par spyod pa de bzhin zhal //
T02D1402:139b-6: zhes pa tshangs par spyod pa ni bde ba ste /
T02D1402:139b-7: de bzhin zhes pa bsrub pa'o //
T02D1402:139b-8: zhal zhes ba rdo rje'i sgor shes par bya ste
T02D1402:139b-9: 'pho ba'i dus na'o zhes pa dam tshig bdun pa'o
T02D1402:139b-10: // 'dren pa rtsa yi kun spyod do //
T02D1402:139b-11: zhes pa la la n'a dang ra sa n'a dang
T02D1402:139b-12: dbu mar rgyu ba'i byang chub kyi sems 'dren pa'o
T02D1402:139b-13: zhes pa'o // de 'dzin pa ni rga ba dang
T02D1402:139b-14: nad la sogs pa bsal ba'i phyir dam tshig bsten
T02D1402:139b-15: ba'o zhes pa dam tshig brgyad pa'o //
T02D1402:139b-16: de ltar phyi'i dam tshig brgyad po de rnams rnal
T02D1402:139b-17: 'byor pa legs par mnyam par gzhag pas 'jig rten
T02D1402:139b-18: gyi bya ba spangs nas skyod bar byed pa gang
T02D1402:139b-19: yin pa de / myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02D1402:139b-20: zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa ste dam tshig bskyang ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D1402:139b-21: da ni dam tshig ces pa la sogs pas dam
T02D1402:139b-22: tshig bye bas dngos grub nyams par brjod par bya'o
T02D1402:139b-23: // 'dir dam tshig bye ba ni rnam pa gnyis te phyi rol dang nang gi bdag nyid do //
T02D1402:139b-24: de la phyi rol du bdud rtsi lnga dang sgron ma lnga po de rnams bza' ba dang /
T02D1402:139b-25: rigs lnga la mngon par bgrod pa dang ma dang
T02D1402:139b-26: sring mo la sogs pa rang gi rigs rnams la
T02D1402:139b-28: gal te bye bar gyur pa de'i tshe dam tshig bye ba'o //
T02D1402:139b-29: dam tshig nyams pa des na 'jig rten pas smad par 'gyur te /
T02D1402:139b-30: yul dang rigs kyi tha snyad kyis 'jig rten pas smad pas bstan pa la smod par 'gyur ro //
T02D1402:139b-31: des ni las dang po pa rnams la sdig par 'gyur te /
T02D1402:139b-32: sdig pa'i mthu las bsod nams nyams so //
T02D1402:139b-33: bsod nams med pa las dngos grub gsum nyams par 'gyur ro //
T02D1402:139b-35: dam tshig rnams ni bye ba yis //
T02D1402:139b-37: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi phyi rol gyi dam tshig bye ba yis zhes pa nges pa'o //
T02D1402:139b-38: nang du ni dam tshig byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le bzhi po rnams so //
T02D1402:140a-0: de rnams bye bas shes pa 'pho bas bde ba chen por @140a * //
T02D1402:140a-2: bde ba chen po nyams pa ni chags pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D1402:140a-3: chags pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni sdig pa ste /
T02D1402:140a-4: sdig pa las sdug bsngal 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1402:140a-5: de ltar dam tshig bye bas 'dod pa'i dngos grub
T02D1402:140a-6: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub rnal 'byor ba rnams
T02D1402:140a-7: kyis thob par mi 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
T02D1402:140a-8: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyis mchog gi dang
T02D1402:140a-9: po'i sangs rgyas su dbang mdor bstan par gsungs pa
T02D1402:140a-11: chags dral las ni sdug bsngal 'byung //
T02D1402:140a-12: sdug bsngal skyes bu'i khams zad byed //
T02D1402:140a-13: zad pa las ni 'chi bar brjod //
T02D1402:140a-16: chags bral las gzhan sdig pa med //
T02D1402:140a-17: bde ba las gzhan bsod nams med //
T02D1402:140a-18: de phyir 'gyur med bde bar sems //
T02D1402:140a-19: mi bdag rtag tu gnas par bya //
T02D1402:140a-21: gzhan yang dam tshig gi le'ur gsungs pa /
T02D1402:140a-22: dngos grub kun gyi gter gyur pa //
T02D1402:140a-23: byang chub sems lhung gyur na 'dir //
T02D1402:140a-24: phung po rnam shes brgyal 'gyur zhing //
T02D1402:140a-25: dngos grub mi 'thob brtul zhugs can //
T02D1402:140a-27: de ltar rgyud kyi rgyal po thams cad du dam
T02D1402:140a-28: tshig bye ba dgag pa phyi rol dang nang du
T02D1402:140a-30: 'dir gang gi tshe phyi rol dang nang du zhi
T02D1402:140a-31: ba dang dag po'i lha rnams rnal 'byor pas bsgrub
T02D1402:140a-32: par bya ba de'i tshe de rnams kyi dam tshig
T02D1402:140a-33: bsten par bya'o // rnam pa thams cad du ni
T02D1402:140a-34: gzhan gyi dam tshig gis gzhan gyi bya ba 'grub
T02D1402:140a-36: sgrub pa po rnams la 'chi ba ster bar byed
T02D1402:140a-37: par 'gyur te rgyud du gsungs pa'i cho ga dang
T02D1402:140a-38: bral ba'i phyir ro zhes pa'o //
T02D1402:140a-39: de'i phyir phyi rol dang nang du dam tshig bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D1402:140a-40: gang gi tshe dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i nyin
T02D1402:140a-41: zhag la bya ba'i phyir dam tshig ni shin tu
T02D1402:140a-43: phyi nas bla ma dam pa rnams kyis rigs kyi bu rnams la dgag par bya'o //
T02D1402:140a-44: dge slong rnams la ni dbang bskur ba'i dus su'ang sbyin par mi bya ste /
T02D1402:140a-45: chos gos 'dzin pa rnams la bla mas rang gi tshig gis thams cad rab tu bstan par bya'o //
T02D1402:140a-46: rnam pa gzhan du bla ma dam tshig nyams par 'gyur ro //
T02D1402:140a-47: de rnams la theg pa chen po la sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D1402:140a-48: lus dang ngag legs par bsdams pa sbyin par bya ste /
T02D1402:140b-0: nyan thos @140b kyi bslab pa ji lta ba de
T02D1402:140b-1: bzhin du lus dang ngag gis bskyang bar bya'o zhes
T02D1402:140b-2: pa dam tshig bskyang bar bya ste dge slong chos
T02D1402:140b-3: gos 'dzin pa rnams kyis dam tshig bskyang bar mi
T02D1402:140b-4: bya'o // chos gos dor bar gyur na lus dang
T02D1402:140b-5: ngag dang sems kyi bya bas dam tshig rjes su
T02D1402:140b-6: bsgrubs pa las kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig gis tshim
T02D1402:140b-7: pas gsal bar rdo rje slob dpon gyi gnas thob
T02D1402:140b-8: pa'i phyir dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o zhes pa
T02D1402:140b-9: dam tshig bye bas dngos grub nyams pa'i nges pa'o
T02D1402:140b-10: bya'o // // 'dir mngon par brjod pa 'bum pa
T02D1402:140b-11: las phyung ba bsdus pa'i rgyud 'dir 'jig rten pa
T02D1402:140b-12: dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub sgrub par
T02D1402:140b-13: byed pa dbang bskur ba la sogs pa dang dam
T02D1402:140b-14: tshig gi don mdor bsdus te /
T02D1402:140b-15: de nas 'di la gsang ba bshad //
T02D1402:140b-16: ces pa la sogs pa nas /
T02D1402:140b-18: zhes pa'i mthar thug pa'i tshigs su bcad pa phyed
T02D1402:140b-19: dang bcas pa bcu gcig po rnams kyis rgyud thams
T02D1402:140b-20: cad kyi don mchog tu gsang ba dgongs pa'i skad
T02D1402:140b-21: gzhan dang rgyud gzhan gyis rtogs par bya ste /
T02D1402:140b-22: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1402:140b-23: pa rnams kyis bla ma dam pa nye bar bsten
T02D1402:140b-24: pas shes pa'o // de ltar bsdus pa'i rgyud thams
T02D1402:140b-25: cad du gsungs pa'i don ni gtso bor rtsa ba'i
T02D1402:140b-26: rgyud dam byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mdzad pa'i
T02D1402:140b-27: 'grel bshad kyi mthar thug gi don 'di thams cad
T02D1402:140b-28: yul gzhan lho dang byang du song ste shes par
T02D1402:140b-29: pas shes pa'o // bya'o // gzhan du mkhas pa'i
T02D1402:140b-30: mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang ldan pa rnams kyis byas
T02D1402:140b-31: pa'i 'grel bshad kyis gsang ba'i don rtogs par mi
T02D1402:140b-32: 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T02D1402:140b-33: 'dir bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi 'grel bshad mdor bsdus pas
T02D1402:140b-34: bsdus pa'i don rab tu gsal bar byas pa ste
T02D1402:140b-35: / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa rnams kyis rgyud rgyas
T02D1402:140b-36: pa'i 'grel bshad rgyas par rtogs par bya'o zhes bcom
T02D1402:140b-37: ldan 'das kyis nges pa'o zhes pa mngon par brjod
T02D1402:140b-38: pa 'bum pa las phyung ba nyung ngu'i rgyud kyi
T02D1402:140b-39: bsdus pa'i don rnam par bshad pa zhes bya ba
T02D1402:140b-40: le'u dang po'i 'grel bshad byang chub sems dpa' chen
T02D1402:140b-41: po phyag na rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1402:141a-0: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po dang la rab 'byor zhi @141a * //
T02D1402:141a-1: ba'i zhal snga nas cog gru lo ts'a ba dge
T02D1402:141a-2: slong ting nge 'dzin bzang pos bsgyur ba las dus
T02D1402:141a-3: phyis thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung rab thams cad la
T02D1402:141a-4: dbang 'byor pa bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal
T02D1402:141a-5: po'i bka' drin gyis nye bar bskyangs pa /
T02D1402:141a-6: legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyi brda sprod pa'i bstan
T02D1402:141a-7: bcos rig pa shang lo ts'a ba dge slong blo
